resources.string: Jatka seuraavaksi Crestron Home -kotisi lunastamista ja ala käyttämään parhaiten suojattua ja turvallisinta etäyhteyttämme.
To claim your Crestron Home system you need to be on the same local network as is your Crestron Home system.
A newer version of Crestron Home firmware is required for this feature to work.\n\n Please contact your Crestron dealer to have them install this new firmware onto your Crestron Home processor.
